text: Aru eneka hoise, jitia Jisu Matthew laga ghor te bohi kene bhat khabole hoise, sabi, bisi poisa utha manu khan9.10 Poisa utha manu khan ke paapi khan eneka koi thakisele, kelemane taikhan to Isor najana manu khan logote bhi kaam kori thaka nimite. aru dusra paapi manu khan bhi ahise aru Jisu aru tai laga chela khan sob eke logote khaise.
